1.93.text:
Hello I'm Vernon Kay and we are on the set
of the Red Nose Day

5.44.text: Make your face funny for money. I am going to be

8.94.text: let loose with some make up on Tess Daly's face

14.78.text: I'm quite nervous about Vernon doing my make up because he's never picked up a brush in his life

19.37.text: he can't even face paint he can't even paint he can't even draw stick people

25.00.text: right this is it I'm going to make Tess's face funny for money

32.02.text: Okay you don't have to push that hard

36.54.text: Don't use spit! Don't use spit

42.64.text: Come here. What I've done so far is put a foundation down

47.28.text:
With the blusher to
complement those stunning colours

52.06.text: I call it the sunrise in the morning

55.04.text:
so to compliment the
sunrise in the morning I need a sunset at tea time

59.68.text: and I'm going to use this eye liner. Just get on with it.

63.30.text: to complement the rosy cheeks. Just do it. So close your eyes my darling.

75.48.text: don't lick your finger again. I didn't lick my finger. Don't go near me with a licked finger

79.25.text: It's not right. Seriously we might fall out me and you.

88.50.text: Red Nose Day is important because we raise a massive amount of cash

92.22.text: for all kinds of different projects

94.10.text: It's not just projects in Africa but also projects in the UK as well

98.06.text:
Comic Relief supports some of the most
vulnerable and disadvantaged people

103.00.text: Haven't got anyone else looking out for them. People who live in poverty

106.05.text:
and you know that it was change lives
they save lives

109.88.text: So this is my creation this is a Tess Daly, Make Your Face Funny For Money

114.34.text:
and as you can see it's got this lovely
big blue skyline eye

121.10.text:
and the cheeks, the rosy-cheeks, look a
little bit like Aunt Sally from Worzel Gummidge

125.64.text:
This is what happens when
you let your other half

127.68.text:
loose with your make up kit and and he's
never even held a lipstick before in his life

134.74.text:
This Red Nose Day why not get
sponsored and let your kids or your partner

138.24.text:
or your friends do you make up for the
day

140.28.text: make your face funny for money

143.80.text: For more info go to rednoseday.com

147.52.text: Visit rednoseday.com/fundraise for more great fundraising ideas

152.10.text: or if you're in need of more visual inspiration then watch this video here

155.88.text: and finally don't forget to subscribe to keep up to date with everything comic relief
